sentences.en: Do they understand the immediacy of the crisis?
sentences.cn: 他们明白危机的紧迫性吗？

sentences.en: For to make lived experience a datum of consciousness is to interject the distinction between subject and object and so to destroy its immediacy.
sentences.cn: 因为使生存经验作为一种自觉的材料便是插入了 主题与客体的区分，因而便取消了这种直接性。

sentences.en: He did not realize the immediacy of the problem.
sentences.cn: 他没意识到这个问题的紧迫性.

sentences.en: He suffered the results in all their immediacy.
sentences.cn: 这一切后果,一下子都影响到了他身上.

sentences.en: In every one of her pictures she conveys a sense of immediacy.
sentences.cn: 她拍的每一张照片中都传递出一种临场感，使人有如亲临现场。

sentences.en: It erects a barrier that severs the pleasure and immediacy of visceral experience.
sentences.cn: 它在单纯的直接的快乐经历和我们之间竖起屏障。

sentences.en: It is the immediacy of events which makes television so popular.
sentences.cn: 是时事报道的即时性使电视如此受到大众欢迎.

sentences.en: Provide full auto and unload apparatus , handiness and immediacy.
sentences.cn: 配备全自动上下料装置, 操作方便快捷.

sentences.en: Self - provided large paper roll hoisting equipment and handiness & immediacy.
sentences.cn: 自备大纸卷起重设备, 操作方便 快捷.

sentences.en: She hoped thereby to convey the'immediacy'of existence.
sentences.cn: 她想借此表现人生中“亲切感 ”.

sentences.en: She hoped to convey the " immediacy " of existence.
sentences.cn: 她想表现人生的 “ 亲切感 ”.

sentences.en: Television allows viewers to experience an event without any loss of immediacy.
sentences.cn: 电视让观众可以即时经历某一事件.

sentences.en: Television has obvious advantages over newspapers in immediacy, motion, color, and convenience.
sentences.cn: 电视在直观形象 、 动态感 、 色彩 、 便利等方面,比报纸有时显的长处.

sentences.en: The books that result have intensity and a fascinating immediacy, far beyond that of ordinary narrative.
sentences.cn: 结果写出来的书情节紧张，矛盾冲突强烈，令人欲罢不能，效果与使用普通的叙事手法大为不同。

sentences.en: The immediacy of the changes and clarity of the code made me feel more in control of the process.
sentences.cn: 代码的改变直接而透明，我能清楚得控制整个过程，反观表格的设计就象在垒砖头。

sentences.en: These supra - consciousness pictures exhibit the immediacy of pure energy presence.
sentences.cn: 这些超意识照片直接陈列了纯净能量的在场.

sentences.en: Writing which is in vogue often has an electric immediacy.
sentences.cn: 时髦的作品往往有一种电光似的直接感.

words.tran_cn: 立即的；直接的；最接近的

trans.tran_cn: 直接（性），即时（性），<哲>直觉性，迫切需要的事物
